column2:
```r
drinks_content %>% 
  mutate(average_calories = mean(Calories)) %>%  #Average Calories = 193.8719 - Simplified to 194
    filter(Calories <= average_calories) %>% 
      summarise(Beverage_category, Beverage, Beverage_prep, Calories) %>% 
        arrange (desc(Calories)) %>% 
          tail (5)
```
